titleStmt.title: Daveidos: or, a specimen of some of David's psalms in English metre With remarks upon the late translators, by Mr. John Phillips.
Bible. O.T. Psalms. English. Selections.
titleStmt.author: Phillips, John, Mr.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for William Keblewhite, at the Swan in St. Paul's Church-Yard

notesStmt.note: The date is erroneous and should read 1698.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
